name: Moevenpick Hotel Berlin

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: Stayed at this hotel last week and was impressed with its cleanliness, overall standards were very high and excellent breakfast with everything you could want to start the day, be it breads, full English, continental, fruits, pastries, smoothes, drinks the lot (22euros expensive if brought on day so make sure you include in package)
reviews.title: Modern, clean and rubber ducks

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is ideally situated near Potsdamer Platz, 10 min walk to Brandenberg Gate, Berlin wall, burning of the books, Hitler bunker, Lego land, check point Charlie and all other sites.
reviews.title: Again and again

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: Would highly recommend this hotel, all staff were helpful and friendly, bar staff not the quickest but again friendly, gym facilities were ok and very clean
reviews.title: Good value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Rooms are better than the pictures seem to sell it as, they are of a fair size, very good bathroom and include a rubber duck, mini-bar and TV with sky (free view channels), towels and beds made and supplied daily
reviews.title: super nice

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Set in a old Siemens headquarters building very good conversion.
reviews.title: Great hotel, great location, great staff - highly recommended.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled on business
reviews.text: As soon as I checked in I knew I would have a great stay at this hotel, the staff at Reception were extremly friendly and helpful.
reviews.title: Brilliant !

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: The Bar was always staffed with friendly and intuitive Bar servers, a plus !
reviews.title: Lovely hotel, good experience.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The breakfast buffet was excellen, a lot of other reviews have mentioned this but I will again, it was great !
reviews.title: Great Hotel and location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Anytime I needed something a kindly emmber of staff was willing to help me.
reviews.title: The Single Worst Hotel Experience In My Life

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Made my trip a pleasure !
reviews.title: brilliant

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our first time in Germany..we absolutely loved this hotel. Awesome accomodations..the bed was superb, modern room (very chic) awesome bathroom, great restaurant and fabulous looking bar with an awesome bartender (Dennis). It was close to the Berlin Wall and walking distance to shops. Staff was friendly and helpful. The room was so awesome i could just stay in bed all day. Breakfast in your room...absolutely devine.
reviews.title: Loved It

likes.liked: — The comfort of the bed, the modern decor and the bar/restaurant staff.

reviews.title: Simply outstanding!
reviews.text: Comfortable beds, delicious food, great location...I loved it. Definitly will consider when will go back.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We used Tripadvisor reviews of this hotel , took the plunge and booked it! We were not disappointed - we have just returned from 3 nights stay. The hotel is really fab and in an ideal spot. Its in a really quiet area within very close proximity to Potsdamer Platz and many tourist attractions; Anhalter Bahnhof underground station is just outside the hotel. The room, the staff and overall ambience of the place are to be recommended. The hotel bar was great too - we used it on our first night there - if only we hadn't been so tired from all that walking or we might have tried it again!
reviews.title: Loved it!

likes.liked: — Exceptionally clean, modern and in great situation

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Berlin is a wonderful city with so much to offer - go soon and stay at the Movenpick!
reviews.title: Best Hotel Room so far

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Check out Insider walking tours too - great!
reviews.title: Great Hotel, Good Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2006, traveled with family
reviews.text: We have stayed in several 4 or 5 star hotels in Berlin, and this is our new favorite one. The hotel is in a great location close to Potsdamer Platz. The neighborhood is a bit quieter than many central locations and we felt safe parking the car on the street at night. The hotel itself is, of course, very colorful! This is done in a stylish way that makes you smile in appreciation. I liked the little details like the quotes painted on the walls and the inlaid flower designs in the hall carpets.
reviews.title: Wonderful hotel!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled with friends
reviews.text: The staff was always very helpful and friendly.
reviews.title: great place to stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast was excellent, especially that Mövenpick yogurt and marmelade.
reviews.title: Grew on us

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled with friends
reviews.text: We had a familly room with an extra bed for our little boy. There was a lot of space there with a very high ceiling. The bathroom was certainly large enough and stylish like the rest of the hotel.
reviews.title: Memorable stay for a moden hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The air conditioning issue was a bit annoying, even in early October, as it didn't work so well and things got stuffy. We tried opening the window -- our window faced the inner courtyard, which is generally the quieter place to be -- but then we could hear breakfast being set-up downstairs through the courtyard's glass ceiling at 3:30 a.m.
reviews.title: A Hotel With A Difference.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: My husband stayed in this hotel for about six months on and off. We also stayed there together as a family for several weekends. The service was consistently friendly, of an excellence standard and proactively helpful without being intrusive. The reception staff speak perfect English and didn't laugh when we tried to practice speaking German with them. The breakfasts are lavish and relaxed, served in a lovely dinner quadrangle where on summer days the glass roof retracts. We ate dinner there on a number of occasions and the food was very good but naturally at hotel prices 15 - 25 Euro for a main I seem to recall. They have quite a seasonal menu which is nice. The location was great, just about 5 minutes walk to the Sony Centre in Potsdamer Platz. Would be happy to recommend this to anyone visiting Berlin whether on business or pleasure.
reviews.title: Great location, lovely service - would use again

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: Could not fault this hotel, amazing building, amazing rooms and great location. Very handy for Underground. Breakfast a bit on the pricey side (23 euro, May 2011). Free internet access, sauna, pool, etc. If your looking for a classy hotel in Berlin, the Movenpick is the one.
reviews.title: No faults

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: while the hotel was in a great location - easy to walk to many places and the room was comfortable and breakfast buffet was excellent, you will need to take an inventory of all your belongings before you go out for the day. We came back to our room to discover a number of personal items were missing - camera battery charger, collapsible water bottle, costume jewellery and birth control pills! (unfortunately the safe doesn't hold all your luggage) While the hotel manager feigned interest and conducted an "investigation" with no one owning up to things taken ( like who would and lose their job), we were left feeling like we were not telling the truth - very indifferent to our loss - nothing they could do or did do. spent the next day checking out where to buy another battery charger as we had another 10 days of travel. Overall not how i wanted to spend the rest of my time in Berlin, wondering what would go missing the next day, as minor as it may have been.
reviews.title: missing personal items

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for three nights in the middle of September.We had a Superior room overlooking the backyard. The room was quiet and very comfortable. The breakfast buffet was delicious but quite expensive. We would to like to recommend you to order the a la carte breakfast menu instead. The hotel is very conveniently situated, only a five minutes' walk from the Potsdamer Platz. The staff was very helpful and we really enjoyed our stay.
reviews.title: Great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: We stayed here with two couples and had a great time. The hotel is very new and the rooms very modern and comfortable. Breakfast is really worth it. And you can also have your morning coffee outside the hotel, overlooking the anhalter bahnhof that is in front of it. And you can see the tempodrom.
reviews.title: Great hotel walking distance from center.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled on business
reviews.text: I only stayed one evening at the Movenpick and have some pro's and con's
reviews.title: Room was more charming than typical large hotels

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011
reviews.title: Clean, spacious hotel with courteous and polite staff.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled on business
reviews.text: The rooms are quite nicely set up and didn't feel sterile like many large hotels
reviews.title: "an okay stay"

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled solo
reviews.text: The building is old and charming
reviews.title: good hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Helpful staff
reviews.title: Really enjoyed my stay - but first day let the hotel down

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My partner and I have just returned from a 2-night stay at the Movenpick booked via a Priceline bid of £40 per night.
reviews.title: Great hotel, really different.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I had read reviews here so sort of knew what to expect but was still taken aback by the uniqueness of the place. It is just REALLY cool! I had emailed ahead to request a king bed and this was granted with no problems. The staff were very polite and helpful.
reviews.title: excellent hotel!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was beautiful and as described in other reviews here. Location was great for visiting the Brandenburg Gate, Checkpoint Charlie and others.
reviews.title: Uber modern, great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I would not hesitate in staying there again.
reviews.title: lovely hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2006, traveled with family
reviews.text: great hotel, one of the best i have ever stayed in europe! spacious rom, a very nice bathroom, excellent service...
reviews.title: Loved it!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Guten Tag
reviews.title: A Movenpick, Berlin Christmas.

likes.liked: — Clean and friendly, with good public transpoer very close by.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2006, traveled with friends
reviews.text: we are just back from another wonderful stay in the Movenpick, Berlin, and have to say that this is a great hotel. We booked the "Surprisingly different" package , to which we added a few days. The staff were very friendly and helpful, as last time we stayed. In fact, some of the staff even knew that we had stayed there in the summer.
reviews.title: Good location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was of a very good size, and also the bathroom. Perhaps some people would want much bigger, but we spent most of our time not in the room, but out and about in Berlin. Perhaps the room was a little cold when you come out of the shower, but we found the room very comfortable, especially as it was so cold outside.
reviews.title: Movenpick was good

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is in a great location, with the S-Bahn and bus stop right outside the hotel, and the U-Bahn just down the road, perhaps a 3-4 minute walk. For getting around Berlin, this is a good location for staying in.
reviews.title: Great Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2006
reviews.text: Be warned, it did feel a little cold when going down for breakfast, but perhaps we felt this more after just coming out of a really snug bed! Also the packed lunch that you get with the package is huge, it comes in a large bag, and is perhaps too large to carry around Berlin on a cold winters day. So we actually left some of it in our room to eat later!
reviews.title: A good hotel, not a great hotel.

description: The surprisingly different Mövenpick Hotel Berlin is as individualand as multi-facetted as the city of Berlin. Centrally but peacefullylocated at Potsdamer Platz, the 4 Star Superior hotel combines innovative interior architecture with modern furnishings. The exceptional design of the former Siemenshöfe lends a special charm tothe location’s atmosphere. The majority of the 243 guest rooms andthe 12 event rooms face towards the quiet courtyards. The ambienceof the restaurant Hof zwei and the adjacent Lobby Bar has been carefully created as has choice of foods and beverages. Attentive, personal service and authentic friendliness comprise perfect hospitality in historic surroundings.
